net.hka.train.seats.booking.business.service

Interface TrainTripService


  • @Service
public interface TrainTripService
    Provides all necessary methods and data structures that are required for handling the train trip details through the following DTO: TrainTripDto, and TrainSeatDto.
    Author:
    Hany Kamal

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_TIME_12HOUR_PATTERN
      Represents the default pattern value for displaying the time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<TrainSeatDto>> bookSeats(TrainTripDto tripDto, java.util.List<TrainSeatDto> renderedSeats)
      Mark the seats of the trip as booked.
      java.lang.Iterable<TrainTripDto> findAll()
      List all trips.
      java.lang.Iterable<TrainTripDto> findAllAvailableTrips()
      List all trips that have available seats for booking.
      java.lang.Iterable<TrainTripDto> findByDestinationAvailableTrips(TrainTripDto tripDto)
      List all trips that have the same destination as provided trip and have available seats for booking.
      java.util.Optional<TrainTripDto> findById(java.lang.Integer id)
      Return the corresponding trip for provided id.
      void setDataStore(java.lang.Iterable<TrainTrip> trips)
      Sets the provided train trip data into a local store.

    • Method Detail

      • setDataStore

        void setDataStore(java.lang.Iterable<TrainTrip> trips)
        Sets the provided train trip data into a local store.
        Parameters:
        trips - An Iterable interface that holds of train trips to be stored.

      • bookSeats

        java.util.Optional<java.util.List<TrainSeatDto>> bookSeats(TrainTripDto tripDto,
                                                           java.util.List<TrainSeatDto> renderedSeats)
        Mark the seats of the trip as booked.
        Parameters:
        tripDto - A trip record that holds seats to be booked.
        renderedSeats - A list of last updated snapshot for seats at each view rendering.
        Returns:
        Optional of a list of TrainTripDto or empty Optional in case of booking operation is failed due to trying to book a already booked seat.

      • findAll

        java.lang.Iterable<TrainTripDto> findAll()
        List all trips.
        Returns:
        An interface for all trips.

      • findByDestinationAvailableTrips

        java.lang.Iterable<TrainTripDto> findByDestinationAvailableTrips(TrainTripDto tripDto)
        List all trips that have the same destination as provided trip and have available seats for booking.
        Parameters:
        tripDto - provided trip
        Returns:
        An interface for all trips that have the same destination as provided trip and have available seats for booking.

      • findAllAvailableTrips

        java.lang.Iterable<TrainTripDto> findAllAvailableTrips()
        List all trips that have available seats for booking.
        Returns:
        An interface for all trips that have available seats for booking.

      • findById

        java.util.Optional<TrainTripDto> findById(java.lang.Integer id)
        Return the corresponding trip for provided id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id value for the targeted trip that need to be fetched.
        Returns:
        Optional of TrainTripDto or empty Optional in case of no record found for the provided id.
